<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kobold Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2390) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 39 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Kobold Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2381)

</column>

---

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), [greatpick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=23), [light pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=30), [pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34), and [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), as well as any [kobold](/Traits.aspx?ID=224) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Kobold Weapon Expertise
